Mendokusai

Tartarus

Knockoff Proleague

06 Mar 2019

Proleague is back! Well, kind of. Naturally I wish it was still an offline event in Seoul, but the new Chinese team league is exciting nonetheless, and even if the quality won't be quite as high as Proleague at its peak, there are still plenty of players I am excited to watch, and the format is solid.

I will of course be rooting for Scarlett and her team, Newbee, but Jin Air Greenwings are definitely, definitely going to win. I have spent the past couple of years pining for a top level team league to grace my mornings, so I am very excited that one has finally returned!
